name: Samurai ★ Saga
description:
Credits:

Donald Will: Head Programmer and Game Designer (willda@sunyit.edu)

Say Mer: Artwork, Assets, and Image Creation (mers@sunyit.edu)

Evan Burgess: Head Level Designer, Musician, Side Project Master, and Secondary Artist (burgese@sunyit.edu)

After Download the game is an executable and should run without any further hassle!

Controls: Keyboard

WASD or Arrow Keys: Movement (left right jump and crouch)

Q: Cannon Launch

K: Self Destruct (Useful if you enter animation bugs or get stuck)

Space: Attack!
